name: BDBT Tips System
description: Business Development and Business Tips platform with enhanced hooks

Edit.name: typecheck
Edit.command: npm run typecheck 2>/dev/null || echo 'Type checking unavailable'

MultiEdit.name: build-check
MultiEdit.command: npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Build check failed'

session-start.name: dev-context
session-start.command: echo '=== BDBT Project Context ===' && git status -sb && echo && echo '=== Recent commits ===' && git log --oneline -5 && echo && echo '=== Available scripts ===' && npm run 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^ {2}[a-z]' || true
